Renewable Energy (tons CO 2e)205017 60% Reduction of total default grid emissionsFiscal and calendar year electricity  
and scope 1 & 2 carbon equivalent 
emissions data for worldwide  
corporate facilities, data centers,  
and Apple retail stores. Carbon  
data are shown both for the default 
utility grid energy (which is what  
we would have emitted had we  
not used any renewable energy) and 
for the effective grid mix that includes 
our Apple-owned and grid-purchased 
renewable energy.
